channel.title: Why doesn’t my password work with 1.3.0 of the Radix Wallet?
channel.description:
There is a bug with version 1.3.0 of the Radix Desktop Wallet that returns invalid password after trying to login to your wallet after upgrading.
## Explanation The problem occurs if you were using a Community Archive node before you upgraded.
## Solution Update your wallet to version 1.3.1 which fixes this specific issue.

item.title: Why doesn’t my password work with 1.3.0 of the Radix Wallet?
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
There is a bug with version 1.3.0 of the Radix Desktop Wallet that returns invalid password after trying to login to your wallet after upgrading.

Explanation

The problem occurs if you were using a Community Archive node before you upgraded.

Solution

Update your wallet to version 1.3.1 which fixes this specific issue.
